briefdescription.para: Build a UDP snapshot packet of current world state.
True after at least one player has joined.
Server-side authoritative simulation for players, bullets and monsters.

detaileddescription.para: Keeps track of entity states and performs time-based updates (movement, spawn, collisions). All networking code stays in UDPGameServer; this class only handles game logic/state.
